definition: forced labor of feudal tenant (corvée)/bailiff of feudal yamen
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: He is the clever evil spirit messenger, is pretends the bright messenger to arrive in this world.
sentences.chinese: 他是鬼魔的差役，是装作光明的使者来到这世上的。

sentences.english: They looked for them but could not find them; and so they returned to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 差役就去搜索他们，却没有找著，便回了耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
sentences.chinese: 差役回答说，从来没有像他这样说话的。

sentences.english: But when the ministers came, and opening the prison, found them not there, they returned and told.
sentences.chinese: 差役来到，在监狱中没有找到他们，便回去报告。

definition: (old) servant hired to keep guard, run errands etc
bailiff responsible for catching criminals (in imperial China)
